definition.de: Rechtssystem, was alle Nationen einschließt, wie die Genfer Konvention, das Internationale Seerecht etc.
definition.dk: Love, der gælder over hele verden, eller i flere lande.
definition.en-GB: The system of laws embraced by all nations, such as the Geneva Convention and the International Law of the Seas
definition.en-US: The system of laws embraced by all nations, such as the Geneva Convention and the International Law of the Seas
definition.pt-BR: Sistema de leis adotadas internacionalmente, como a convenção de Genebra, o direito do mar etc.
definition.pt-PT: Sistema de leis adotadas internacionalmente, como a convenção de Genebra, o direito do mar, etc.
definition.se: Lagar som gäller i hela världen, eller åtminstone i flera länder och inte bara i ett land.
definition.zh-Hans: 被所有国家接受的法律体系，如《日内瓦公约》、《国际海洋法公约》等
